english.segment1: Yeah I trust in You. I remember times You led me. This time it's bigger now. And I'm afraid You'll let me down
english.segment2: But how can I be certain?. Will You prove Yourself again?
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. 'Cause I'm about to let go. And live what I believe. I can't do a thing now. But trust that You'll catch me. When I let go. When I let go
english.segment4: What is this doubt in me. Convincing me to fear the unknown. When all along You've shown. Your plans are better than my own
english.segment5: And I know I won't make it. If I do this all alone
